attributes.action: Freeze petrol tax for the next 5 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Another increase in petrol tax will probably be the last straw for many car/vehicle owners. We are one of the most taxed nations in the commonwealth in regards to transport systems and so far I have yet to see any of this daylight robbery government income spent on major road/rail/air network improvments. We are a country balancing on an old infastructure on the brink of collapse.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
